ItemTooltips.branches: Cheap stats on a stick. This and a tango is all you can afford if you want a timely bottle.
ItemTooltips.bottle: At last, rune control and overall replenishment!
ItemTooltips.tango: Your only regen item. You want that fast bottle.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Queen of Pain is frail, leave this on STR.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Improves your ulti. You may want to consider this before the Scythe if you feel the extra disable is not truly necessary.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Armor and AoE slow nuke. Perfect for our frail but slippery Queen.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Your defensive item. Spell Block + Blink = Slippery QoP ( pun intended ).
ItemTooltips.skadi: Stats, stats everywhere. An extra snare to help your team. The game will probably not get this far.

AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_shadow_strike: Harassment tool. Snares foes, costs little mana. 150 damage after reduction.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_scream_of_pain: AoE Nuke. Max it after you grab 1 pt in dagger and blink.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_sonic_wave: Large AoE nuke cone. Max it ASAP.
